name: Like Babe But With A Dog
name_original: Like Babe But With A Dog
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021  

you control the dog using either arrow keys or WASD, and try to steer the sheep away from you. 'z' or the shift key allows you to dash quickly, and you won't scare the sheep whilst dashing.

I all of the coding and most of the art was done by me however:

The grass texture and victory toot were from OpenGameArt.com, where I have also posted all the assets I made for this project.

The excellent music was from the album 'Fairy' by Serge Quandrado, and is licensed under: CC BY-NC-ND. The source can be found here: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/serge-quadrado/fairy 

A lot of my understanding of Godot came from an excellent tutorial by HeartBeast, and the coding for the sheep is based on a great boids tutorial by NAD LABS

The name was thought of in 1 minute as the deadline loomed, and thus has an unfortunately lacklustre acronym :(

If you are colour blind or otherwise struggle to make out the objective zones please let me know, if it turns out to be an issue I will edit it and reupload.
